## Overview

You return an `INCallCapabilityResolutionResult` object when resolving parameters containing an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCallCapability] value. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to resolve the parameter successfully. The resolved value can be different than the original [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCallCapability]. This flexibility allows app extensions to apply business logic constraints.

Use [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult/notRequired()] to continue with a `nil` value. For additional resolution operators, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

# INCallCapabilityResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for the call capability for the call.

## Declaration

```swift
class INCallCapabilityResolutionResult
```

## Overview

You return an `INCallCapabilityResolutionResult` object when resolving parameters containing an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCallCapability] value. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to resolve the parameter successfully. The resolved value can be different than the original [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCallCapability]. This flexibility allows app extensions to apply business logic constraints.

Use [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult/notRequired()] to continue with a `nil` value. For additional resolution operators, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified call capability.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates a result that asks Siri to verify the request that the user wants to continue.

## Resolution Results

- **INCallRecordResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the details of a call.
- **INCallRecordTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the types of calls that your app handled.
- **INCallDestinationTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the destination type of a call.
- **INCallRecordTypeOptionsResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the call types to include in a search.
- **INStartCallContactResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the contact for the call.
- **INStartCallCallCapabilityResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the call capability for the call.
- **INStartCallCallRecordToCallBackResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the redial capabilities of a missed call.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Inherited By

- INStartCallCallCapabilityResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
